title: LP gains dropped?
body: so for the last few weeks i've been winning a tonne of games, and have been getting 20+ LP consistantly, generally it's 23, however i had a fairly bad losing streak of about 6-7 games yesterday, and today i'm only getting +15LP per game... i'm also pretty sure that on the game that i won when i broke my losing streak, i got +20LP, so i'm super confused with this... i duo a lot with people around my rank, could this have something to do with it? (the +15LP games were soloq)

replies.body: I know wat ur saying, it probably has to do something with ur mmr, the worse it is, the more chance ur gonna win, and the less chance of u getting more lp.

Once you start getting heavy losing streaks matchmaking drops your MMR down so you end up being grouped with lesser skilled opponents (who are worth less LP as a team). It'll even out once you start winning again.
